content.text:
# List of Greek-made weapons and improvements from interwar and World War II

}}
This is a list of land weapons made by Greece during World War II.
Knives and bayonets
* bayonet M1903/14
* bayonet M1939
Explosives
* Churnat grenade
*  Churnat anti-tank mine
Rifles
Bolt action
* Philippidis rifle
* Lelakis rifle
Semi-automatic
* Rigopoulos rifle
Submachine guns
* Makrykano M1943
Machine guns
Heavy machine guns
* Modified Hotchkiss 13.2mm Dual Purpose
Medium machine guns
* EYP Hotchkiss
Light machine guns
* EPK M1939
See also
* List of Greek military equipment of World War II
References
